to avoid unwanted calls and SMS messages.

[b]Anti-theft[/b]

Helps you find your mobile device if it has been lost or stolen and, if necessary, will wipe your confidential information from the device remotely.

[b]Cloud Checker[/b]

Cloud Checker will protect you from unwanted Internet resources. Block access to non-recommended or potentially dangerous sites in the following categories:

[b]Security Auditor[/b]

Troubleshoot the device to identify security problems and offer solutions to address them. The Security Audit identifies:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Applications that can interfere with operation of Dr.Web for Android.

How to remove Dr.Web for Android with installed anti-theft
Before removing the Dr.Web anti-virus, go to Administration. Under Security, clear the Dr.Web Anti-virus option.

[b]Whats New[/b]
